identity.name: E1 - The Government Archivist
identity.description: A system that values clarity over decoration. Every pixel serves the data. The design is stark, relying on whitespace, typography, and structure to convey hierarchy.

rules: Headings MUST utilize Merriweather for that 'Official Document' aesthetic.
Body text should use Public Sans for high legibility on screens.
Data values (dates, IDs) should use JetBrains Mono for precision.
Use uppercase with wide tracking (tracking-widest) for labels and table headers.

guidelines: Use patterns (stripes, dots) or borders to distinguish states if needed, not color.
Error states: Use thick black borders and bold text, not red.
Success states: Use black background with white text.
Backgrounds: Pure white (#ffffff) for papers/cards, very light gray (#f9fafb) for the app background.

layout.container_style: Sharp edges, 1px solid borders, no shadows (flat design).

dashboard_structure.sidebar: Fixed width (250px), border-r border-gray-200, white bg.
dashboard_structure.card: bg-white border border-gray-200 p-6 shadow-none hover:border-black transition-colors duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-black text-white hover:bg-gray-800 rounded-none px-6 py-3 font-medium uppercase tracking-wide text-sm
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-black border border-black hover:bg-gray-100 rounded-none px-6 py-3 font-medium uppercase tracking-wide text-sm

inputs.style: border-b-2 border-gray-200 focus:border-black bg-transparent px-0 py-2 outline-none rounded-none transition-all placeholder:text-gray-400

tables.header: border-b-2 border-black text-black font-bold uppercase text-xs tracking-wider pb-3

header.title: Relatório de Produção de: [Month/Year]
details: Org: Prefeitura Municipal de Canaã dos Carajás

styles.font: Times New Roman or Merriweather for print.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALLATION: Run 'npm install lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge date-fns @react-pdf/renderer' immediately.
THEME: Force Light Mode. Remove any dark mode toggles. This is a government tool.
COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn UI to remove all 'rounded-md' classes. Make everything 'rounded-none' or 'rounded-sm'.
PDF: Use '@react-pdf/renderer' for generating the PDF. It allows React-based PDF creation.
DATA: Mock the database for now if needed, but the prompt mentions MongoDB. Ensure the frontend connects to FastAPI.
SEARCH: Implement a client-side filter for the dashboard for instant feedback.
TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all form inputs (e.g., 'input-demanda', 'input-solicitacao').
CRITICAL: The UI must be boringly efficient. No fancy flying animations. Just fast micro-interactions.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through borders and whitespace, not shadows.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (fade, color swap) - no movement.
Use proper HTTP status codes in backend.
